subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Paul Lo Duca, who was the Mets’ catcher for two years, will replace Brian Schneider, whom the Mets acquired from the Nationals 11 days ago to fill Lo Duca’s position.
snippet: Paul Lo Duca, who was the Mets’ catcher for two years, will replace Brian Schneider, whom the Mets acquired from the Nationals 11 days ago to fill Lo Duca’s position.
